author: Special Correspondent
text:
A street play was organised here on Tuesday evening to create awareness about public sector enterprises and the issues confronting the sector.

Over 200 employees of various public sector organisations participated in the programme.

The street play was on issues such as vacancies in public sector enterprises, services rendered by these organisation, and impact of privatisation, and also to motivate the employees of these enterprises.

The street play started in Kanyakumari and is travelling to important cities in the State.

It will conclude in Chennai on March 5.

The All India Bank Officers’ Confederation organised the programme here, a release here has said.
title: Street play creates awareness about PSEs
